themes: desire for experimental and innovative art
critique of dominant narratives in the arts
support for sincerity, honesty, and intellectual depth
preference for work not centered on identity politics or social trauma
need for support of underrepresented ideas
key_phrases: more work that doesn’t reinforce any particular narrative
projects that elevate sincerity, honesty, complexity, rationality, humor, and intellectual depth
not defined by identity politics or social trauma
support for underrepresented ideas, not just underrepresented identities
barriers_identified: emphasis on identity politics or social trauma over other themes
lack of support for underrepresented ideas
solutions_proposed: support projects that elevate sincerity, honesty, complexity, rationality, humor, and intellectual depth
prioritize support for underrepresented ideas, not just underrepresented identities
